name: A.D.M.I.N.
description: A.D.M.I.N. programs a custom configuration per player each game.  On Ability cast, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 18 Ability Power On Ability cast, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 18% Attack Damage On Ability cast, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 18% Attack Speed On Ability cast, A.D.M.I.N.s heal 250 Health On Ability cast, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 18 permanent maximum Health 33% chance to drop gold  On kill, the killer gains 20 Ability Power On kill, the killer gains 20% Attack Damage On kill, the killer gains 20% Attack Speed On kill, the killer heals 400 Health On kill, the killer gains 18 permanent maximum Health 40% chance to drop gold  Every 5 seconds, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 18 Ability Power Every 5 seconds, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 18% Attack Damage Every 5 seconds, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 18% Attack Speed Every 5 seconds, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 40 Mana Every 5 seconds, A.D.M.I.N.s get 10 permanent maximum Health 25% chance to drop gold  Every 5 seconds, your team gains 15 Ability Power Every 5 seconds, your team gains 15% Attack Damage Every 5 seconds, your team gains 15% Attack Speed Every 5 seconds, your team gains 20 Mana Every 5 seconds, your team gains 6 permanent maximum Health Every 5 seconds, your team heals 150 Health 15% chance to drop gold  At 66% Health, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 60 Ability Power At 66% Health, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 60% Attack Damage At 66% health, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 60% Attack Speed At 66% Health, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 45 permanent maximum Health At 66% Health, A.D.M.I.N.s gain a 25% Health shield 60% chance to drop gold  On ally death, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 15 Ability Power On ally death, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 15% Attack Damage On ally death, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 15% Attack Speed On ally death, A.D.M.I.N.s gain 10 permanent maximum Health On ally death, A.D.M.I.N.s heal 250 Health 20% chance to drop gold  Combat start: A.D.M.I.N.s gain 40 Ability Power Combat start: A.D.M.I.N.s gain 40% Attack Damage Combat start: A.D.M.I.N.s gain 40% Attack Speed Combat start: A.D.M.I.N.s gain 30 permanent maximum Health 50% chance to drop gold  Combat start: your team gains 30 Ability Power Combat start: your team gains 30% Attack Damage Combat start: your team gains 30% Attack Speed Combat start: your team gains 20 permanent maximum Health Combat start: your team gains a 25% Health shield 25% chance to drop gold

synergyLevel.description: [Add another effect to the program]. Boost all tiers by 25%

name: Anima Squad
description: Anima Squad members pose after champion kills, increasing their fame. Each point of fame grants 5 permanent Health to each Anima Squad member.  They also gain:

name: LaserCorps
description: When a LaserCorp agent attacks or is hit by an attack, their drone deals magic damage to the agent's target (0.4 second cooldown). Drones are reassigned to another champion with a drone when the agent dies.  Drone lasers deal:

synergyLevel.description: 35 magic damage AND all champions get a drone.

name: Brawler
description: Brawlers gain additional maximum Health.

name: Mecha:PRIME
description: Use the Mecha selector item to choose a PRIME. Combat start: The PRIME combines with the 2 nearest Mecha, absorbing 90% of their Base Health.

synergyLevel.description: The PRIME gains 60 Ability Power and 60% Attack Damage
All Mechas gain 55 Ability Power and 55% Attack Damage; the PRIME gains double this amount
Threats do not have a Trait bonus, but instead have powerful Abilities and increased base stats.

name: Mascot
description: Your team heals a percentage of their maximum Health every 2 seconds, and Mascots heal double the amount. When Mascots die, they retreat to the sidelines to cheer on your team. Your team's healing increases by 1% for each cheering Mascot.

name: Forecaster
description: Depending on the weather, The Forecaster grants a different bonus to adjacent allies. The weather changes every game.   Sunny Weather  Combat start: Grant a 400/600/2000 Health shield to adjacent allies for 10/10/45 seconds.   Windy Weather  Combat start: Grant bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power to adjacent allies, increasing 8/15/99% every 5 seconds.   Rainy Weather  Combat start: Grant 20/40/100 Mana to adjacent allies.

name: Ace
description: This Trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Aces.

synergyLevel.description: Aces execute enemies they damage under 15% Health
Aces execute enemies they damage under 33% Health

name: Duelist
description: Innate: Increased movement speed. Duelists' attacks grant bonus Attack Speed, up to 12 stacks.

synergyLevel.description: +10% Attack Speed per stack; Duelists take 10% less damage
+16% Attack Speed per stack; Duelists take 20% less damage

name: Ox Force
description: Ox Force units gain bonus defenses. Once per combat, when they would drop below one health, they instead shield themselves for 50% of their maximum health for 1.5 seconds.

name: Aegis
description: Your team gains bonus Magic Resist, and Aegis units gain more.

name: Underground
description: The Underground must sneak through the sewers after each player combat and crack 10 locks to open a vault. When the vault opens, you may choose to take the loot now, or attempt another heist for even better rewards.

name: Star Guardian
description: Star Guardians gain more Mana in combat.

synergyLevel.description: Once per combat at 50% Health, Pranksters spawn a target dummy, move to a safe location, and restore 150 Health.
And, Prankster dummies stun the enemy that killed them for 1.5 seconds.
The Health restore is increased to 350 Health and the stun duration becomes 2 seconds.

name: Heart
description: When Heart units cast their Ability, your team gains stacking Ability Power for the rest of combat.

synergyLevel.description: Combat start: Lie dormant while absorbing the souls of allies that die. Gain 40 Ability Power for each soul. Once per combat at 70% Health (or when your team has died), come alive and fight.
Combat start: Strike a pose that grants your team 18% bonus damage, which increases by 3% for every 3-star champion on your team.

name: Renegade
description: Renegade units deal bonus damage, and the last one standing deals more.

synergyLevel.description: 25% bonus damage, extra 20% for last alive
40% bonus damage, extra 30% for last alive
70% bonus damage, extra 40% for last alive

name: Spellslinger
description: Every 5 seconds, Spellslinger's next attack instead fires a magic orb at a random target, which explodes for 50% Ability Power as magic damage.  Spellslingers gain:

synergyLevel.description: +110 Ability Power, and orbs deal 100% Ability Power

name: Sureshot
description: Combat start: Sureshots gain bonus Attack Damage now, and every 4 seconds.

name: Defender
description: Your team gains bonus Armor, and Defenders gain more.

name: Gadgeteen
description: Each round, Gadgeteens create random modified weapons with powerful effects that fall apart after one round. Gadgeteens also gain Damage and Damage Reduction for each item equipped to them.

name: Hacker
description: Hackers gain  Omnivamp  and summon a H4ckerr!m. Any unit placed in the rider hex will be sent to the enemy backline and is untargetable for the first 2 seconds of combat.

synergyLevel.description: +20% Omnivamp for Hackers, +15% for the rider
+40% Omnivamp for Hackers, +40% for the rider  Omnivamp : heal for some of damage dealt

name: InfiniTeam
description: The InfiniTeam opens a portal to an alternate timeline. At the start of combat, any InfiniTeam unit placed on a portal summons an alternate version of themself with different items. They get 1 for each Augment you own.   The copies have reduced Health and damage.

synergyLevel.description: Riftwalkers open a gap between dimensions and summon their ally Zac, who grows in power based on the total star level of Riftwalkers.Zac gains the last-listed Trait of the closest Riftwalker.

Ezreal learns from his older, more handsome self and joins him in future adventures.  Ezreal's Ability becomes a blast that hits all enemies in a line.  Ultimate Ezreal's Ability summons two additional temporal duplicates.

name: Quickdraw
description: After every 2 damaging ability projectiles, Quickdraw units fire a bonus ability projectile. Bonus shots deal:
